bug.summary: Calling module.log(...) within a callback fails
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Calling pl_module.log(...) within a Callback fails, even though this is recommended by the documentation here: <denchmark-link:https://pytorch-lightning.readthedocs.io/en/latest/loggers.html#logging-from-a-callback>https://pytorch-lightning.readthedocs.io/en/latest/loggers.html#logging-from-a-callback</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-code> File "my_callback_file.py", line XX, in on_validation_epoch_end pl_module.log_dict(my_metrics_dict) File "/home/local/USHERBROOKE/pain5474/opt/miniconda3/envs/cav/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/core/lightning.py", line 287, in log_dict self.log( File "/home/local/USHERBROOKE/pain5474/opt/miniconda3/envs/cav/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/core/lightning.py", line 233, in log self._results.log( File "/home/local/USHERBROOKE/pain5474/opt/miniconda3/envs/cav/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/core/step_result.py", line 171, in log self.__set_meta( File "/home/local/USHERBROOKE/pain5474/opt/miniconda3/envs/cav/lib/python3.8/site-packages/pytorch_lightning/core/step_result.py", line 217, in __set_meta _internal = self['meta']['_internal'] KeyError: '_internal' python-BaseException </denchmark-code>
